posts.title: Goals
posts.body:
I am currently a production support engineer in societe Generale, I want to be Software developer Engineer in any good product based company with good CTC.
Please help me my bhagwan.

I want to be fit as now i am overweighted.

posts.title: Vijendra feels lonely
posts.body:
I feel very lonely, because i don't have the habits which others have for time passing.
so please bhagwan help me in finding best suitable girl for me.
with whom i can spend my whole life happily.
